featured.text: As Deborah shuffled sideways to block the player, her knee went out and she collapsed on the court in burning pain.
Usually, the kilt covers the body from the waist down to just above the knees.
Injuries limited Deborah’s time on the court as she hurt her knees three more times in the next five years.
She injured her knee when she was trying to block her opponent.
How did Deborah feel when she first hurt her knee? (A) Excited. (B) Confused. (C) Ashamed.

definition.zh_def: 膝蓋，腿部的關節，連接大腿和小腿。
definition.en_def: The joint between the thigh and the lower leg.
definition.example: She hurt her knee while playing soccer.
